issues.description: No value proposition exists due to failed upstream designers - customers have zero clarity on what LaunchBase does
issues.rationale: Without any brand or design system output, there's literally no value prop to evaluate

issues.description: Complete absence of pricing tiers and comparison framework - customers can't evaluate options
issues.rationale: No pricing structure means customers abandon due to confusion

issues.description: Zero objection handling for small business concerns about cost, complexity, and time investment
issues.rationale: Small businesses need reassurance about ROI and ease of use

issues.description: No differentiation from competitors - missing unique selling proposition for SaaS market
issues.rationale: SaaS market is crowded; unclear positioning means instant bounce

issues.description: Absent social proof placement strategy - no testimonials or case studies framework
issues.rationale: Small businesses rely heavily on peer validation before purchasing

issues.description: Missing benefit hierarchy - features vs benefits not distinguished for audience
issues.rationale: Small business owners care about outcomes, not technical features

issues.description: No risk reversal messaging - missing guarantees or trial period communication
issues.rationale: Small businesses are risk-averse and need safety nets

issues.description: Undefined onboarding promise - no clarity on time-to-value for new customers
issues.rationale: Small businesses need to know how quickly they'll see results

issues.description: Missing support visibility - no clear communication about help availability
issues.rationale: Small businesses worry about getting stuck without help

issues.description: Absent scalability messaging - no clear path for growing businesses
issues.rationale: Small businesses want solutions that grow with them

suggestedFixes.fix: Create headline: 'Launch Your Business Online in 7 Days - No Tech Skills Required'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clear promise with specific timeframe addresses small business needs

suggestedFixes.fix: Design 3-tier pricing: Starter ($29), Growth ($79), Scale ($199) with clear feature comparison table
suggestedFixes.rationale: Simple tier structure with predictable pricing reduces decision fatigue

suggestedFixes.fix: Add objection cards: 'No contracts', '30-day money back', 'Setup in 15 minutes'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Directly addresses top 3 small business fears about SaaS adoption

suggestedFixes.fix: Position as 'The only platform with done-for-you templates specifically for [industry]'
Place 3 testimonials above fold with business name, photo, and specific results achieved
suggestedFixes.rationale: Specific results from peers build immediate credibility

suggestedFixes.fix: Lead with benefits: 'Get more customers' not 'Advanced analytics dashboard'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Outcome-focused messaging resonates with business owners

suggestedFixes.fix: Add prominent '30-Day Money Back Guarantee' badge near pricing with no-questions-asked policy
suggestedFixes.rationale: Removes purchase risk for cautious small businesses

suggestedFixes.fix: Promise: 'Live in 24 hours with our guided setup wizard and dedicated onboarding specialist'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Specific timeline and human support reduces implementation anxiety

suggestedFixes.fix: Add sticky 'Get Help' button with '24/7 chat support' badge and average response time
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visible support options reduce fear of abandonment

suggestedFixes.fix: Include growth path messaging: 'Start small, scale unlimited - no migration needed'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Assures businesses they won't outgrow the solution
